docs.lead_paragraph: Sixteen million children were on food stamps as of last year, the highest number since the nation's economy tumbled in 2008.

headline.main: Census: 1 in 5 Children on Food Stamps
headline.print_headline: Census: 1 in 5 Children on Food Stamps

docs.snippet: Sixteen million children were on food stamps as of last year, the highest number since the nation's economy tumbled in 2008.

headline.main: How Weight Training Can Help You Keep the Weight Off

docs.abstract: Exercise can help keep the pounds off after weight loss, and weight training may be particularly beneficial, a new study shows.
docs.snippet: Exercise can help keep the pounds off after weight loss, and weight training may be particularly beneficial, a new study shows.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new program at Hostos Community College will go beyond culinary classes to offer students a broad overview of food policy, social justice and business.

headline.main: Hostos College in Bronx to Offer a Food Studies Program
headline.print_headline: College in Bronx to Offer a Food Studies Program

docs.abstract: Hostos Community College in Bronx will offer new interdisciplinary program in food studies, which aims to prepare students for work in borough's fast-growing food industry.
docs.snippet: A new program at Hostos Community College will go beyond culinary classes to offer students a broad overview of food policy, social justice and business.

docs.lead_paragraph: We love pizza. We love muffaletta. We decided they probably would be easy to love together.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pfizer Inc.'s fourth-quarter profit fell by half as worsening generic competition and unfavorable currency rates reduced sales, and higher research and legal costs also reduced the bottom line.

headline.print_headline: Pfizer Net Down on Lower Sales, Higher Research, Legal Costs

docs.snippet: Pfizer Inc.'s fourth-quarter profit fell by half as worsening generic competition and unfavorable currency rates reduced sales, and higher research and legal costs also reduced the bottom line.

docs.lead_paragraph: India conferred one of its highest civilian awards on billionaire philanthropist and Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates and his wife Melinda for their work to improve health in developing countries.

headline.main: India Honors Bill Gates With Civilian Award
headline.print_headline: India Honors Bill Gates With Civilian Award

docs.snippet: India conferred one of its highest civilian awards on billionaire philanthropist and Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates and his wife Melinda for their work to improve health in developing countries.

docs.lead_paragraph: Post Holdings will spend $1.15 billion to bulk up its presence in the cereal aisle by buying the privately held MOM Brands Co., maker of Malt-O-Meal cereals.

headline.main: Post Holdings to Pay $1.15B for Malt-O-Meal Cereal Maker
headline.print_headline: Post Holdings to Pay $1.15B for Malt-O-Meal Cereal Maker

docs.snippet: Post Holdings will spend $1.15 billion to bulk up its presence in the cereal aisle by buying the privately held MOM Brands Co., maker of Malt-O-Meal cereals.

docs.lead_paragraph: Cereal maker Post Holdings Inc said it would acquire privately held rival MOM Brands Co for about $1.15 billion to expand in the growing bagged and hot cereal categories, sending its shares up as much as 9 percent.

headline.main: Post Holdings to Buy MOM Brands to Expand in Hot Cereals Market
headline.print_headline: Post Holdings to Buy MOM Brands to Expand in Hot Cereals Market

docs.snippet: Cereal maker Post Holdings Inc said it would acquire privately held rival MOM Brands Co for about $1.15 billion to expand in the growing bagged and hot cereal categories, sending its shares up as much as 9 percent.

headline.main: Salt May Not Affect Heart Risks
headline.print_headline: Nutrition: Salt May Not Drive Heart Risk

docs.abstract: A new study suggests that dietary salt may have little or no effect on the risk for heart disease in older adults.
docs.snippet: A new study suggests that dietary salt may have little or no effect on the risk for heart disease in older adults.
